text-align-last: start

This test checks that text-align-last property works properly.
The last line of each case should be aligned to start side.

LTR align is start

align-last is start.

LTR align is end

align-last is start.

LTR align is right

align-last is start.

LTR align is left

align-last is start.

RTL align is start

align-last is start.

RTL align is end

align-last is start.
